Affinity.DESCRIPTION: #yAffinity can be of any color between NL [A-Fire], [A-Air], [A-Mind], [A-Earth], [A-Light], [A-Dark]. NL [A-Water], [A-Poison], [A-Steel], [A-Thunder], [A-Nature], [A-Cyber]. NL [A-Gen] refers either to generic #yAffinity, or your current best #yAffinity.

Affinity Count.DESCRIPTION: The numbers to the right of each #yAffinity denote the number of cards in your hand that have that #yAffinity. NL [A-Gen] denotes your current highest #yAffinity #yCount. NL NL #yAffinity effects on cards will only activate if your hand's #yAffinity #yCount passes the threshold of the #yAffinity listed on the card. NL NL The ovals to the right of each #yAffinity denote the amount of their #yAffinity #yPower that you currently have (the left-hand number) and its next threshold (the right-hand number). These numbers will be #ggreen if the #yAffinity #yPower is #yRetained and grey if it is disabled.

Affinity Token.DESCRIPTION: #yPower which increases your #yAffinity for the rest of combat.

Agility Stance.DESCRIPTION: Stance: [A] is always #yRetained. Other [A-Gen] #yPowers cannot be gained. NL If re-entered: #yBoost [A].

Blessing Stance.DESCRIPTION: Stance: [L] is always #yRetained. Other [A-Gen] #yPowers cannot be gained. NL If re-entered: #yBoost [L].

Blinded.DESCRIPTION: Reduces #yAttack damage by #b3, or by #b4 if at least #b1 [Dark] is #yChanneled. At the end of turn, reduce [Blinded] by #b1.

Blur.DESCRIPTION: Your #yBlock will not be removed at the start of your next turn.

Boost.DESCRIPTION: Gain the specified power, it does not decrease at the start of next turn.

Burning.DESCRIPTION: Increases incoming #yAttack damage by #b15% (min. #b1 additional damage). This multiplier can be increased by card effects. NL At the start of turn, lose HP equal to #b50% of [Burning] and reduce [Burning] by #b1.

Chaika Clone.DESCRIPTION: Chaika Bohdan, Chaika Kamaz, Chaika Trabant, Frederika, Layla, Viivi Holopainen.

Choked.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card this turn, the target loses 1 HP.

Constricted.DESCRIPTION: Take damage at the end of each turn.

Cooldown.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play this card, reduce its #yCooldown by #b1. If it is at #b0, activate this effect instead.

Corruption Stance.DESCRIPTION: Stance: [D] is always #yRetained. Other [A-Gen] #yPowers cannot be gained. NL If re-entered: #yBoost [D].

Counter-Attack.DESCRIPTION: If you fully block all enemy #yAttacks this turn (at least #b1^), gain #yVigor and apply #b1 [Vulnerable] to ALL enemies.

Counterattack.DESCRIPTION: The next time you are attacked, deal damage to the attacker.

Cycle.DESCRIPTION: Discard a certain number of cards then draw that many cards.

Delayed Damage.DESCRIPTION: Take damage at the end of your turn.

Demon Form.DESCRIPTION: Gain #yStrength at the start of each turn.

Desecration.DESCRIPTION: Increases the effects of [Frail], [Vulnerable], [Weak], and [Lock-On] on the enemy. When any character gains [Delayed Damage], increase it by 1 per stack.

Diminish.DESCRIPTION: Decrease the stat of a card for the rest of this combat.

Divinity Stance.DESCRIPTION: Upon entering Divinity Stance: Gain [EN][EN][EN].  You attacks deal triple damage.  Start of Next Turn: Exit this Stance.

Double Tap.DESCRIPTION: Your next Attacks are played twice.

Elemental Exposure.DESCRIPTION: Amplifies the effects of Burning and Freezing. Lasts for 2 turns.

Elemental Mastery.DESCRIPTION: At the end of the turn, Inflict Elemental Exposure to all enemies. Stacks increase whenever an Orb is Channeled or Induced.

Enchanted Armor.DESCRIPTION: Take less damage from #yAttacks. NL Example: NL #b10 -> #g10%, #b25 -> #g20%, NL #b50 -> #g33%, #b100 -> #g50%

Endurance.DESCRIPTION: Reduces the effects of [Frail], [Vulnerable], and [Weak] on you. Retain up to 2 Block per stack each turn.

Energized.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] at the start of next turn.

Enhance.DESCRIPTION: Increase the stat of a card for the rest of this combat.

Envenom.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an attack deals unblocked damage, apply #b1 #yPoison.

Eternal.DESCRIPTION: Cannot be removed from your deck. When exhausted, returns to your draw pile and changes form if it has multiple forms.

Fetch.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card and move it to your hand.

Flame Barrier.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal #b1 damage back.

Flight.DESCRIPTION: Take 50% less #yAttack damage. Lose #b1 stack until end of turn when taking damage, the power is cancelled at #b0 stacks.

Force Stance.DESCRIPTION: Stance: [F] is always #yRetained. Other [A-Gen] #yPowers cannot be gained. NL If re-entered: #yBoost [F].

Freezing.DESCRIPTION: Reduces outgoing #yAttack damage by #b10% (min. #b1 less damage). This multiplier can be increased up to #b40% by card effects. NL At the start of turn, lose HP equal to #b50% of [Freezing] and reduce [Freezing] by #b1.

Full Hand.DESCRIPTION: Six or more cards in hand prior to playing this card.

Guard Stance.DESCRIPTION: Upon entering Guard Stance: ALL characters gain 10 Block. || Start of Turn: ALL characters gain 15 Block.

Imitate.DESCRIPTION: #yImitating a card creates a #y0-Cost copy of it with #yPurge, and with base damage and #yBlock reduced to #b1.

Impaired.DESCRIPTION: Reduces the effectiveness of your Orbs.

Induce.DESCRIPTION: Evokes a copy of an Orb without Channeling it.

Inspiration.DESCRIPTION: The next time you activate an interactable #yPower, gain 1 [E].

Intellect Stance.DESCRIPTION: Stance: [W] is always #yRetained. Other [A-Gen] #yPowers cannot be gained. NL If re-entered: #yBoost [W].

Juggernaut.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain #yBlock, deal damage to a random enemy.

Limited.DESCRIPTION: This effect can only trigger once per combat, across all copies of this card.

Loyal.DESCRIPTION: If this would enter your discard pile, move it to your draw pile instead.

Maintain.DESCRIPTION: This turn, prevent an #yAffinity #yPower from decreasing. If it was disabled due to a Stance, it can be gained this turn.

Malleable.DESCRIPTION: Upon receiving damage, gain #yBlock. #yBlock gain increases as this power is triggered. Resets at the start of turn.

Metallicize.DESCRIPTION: Gain #yBlock at the start of your turn.

Multicolor.DESCRIPTION: Counts as an #yAffinity of any color.

Phasing.DESCRIPTION: You have a 35% chance to dodge each attack. Reduce this chance by 5% each turn. Stacking this power resets and delays the chance reduction by 1 turn.

Orb Stance.DESCRIPTION: You have +4 [Focus] while in this Stance.  Start of Turn or Upon Entering or Exiting Orb Stance: Lose 1 [Strength] and 1 [Dexterity].

Plated Armor.DESCRIPTION: Gain #yBlock at the end of your turn. Reduced by #b1 when receiving damage.

Protagonist.DESCRIPTION: When you add this card to your deck: Add 1 of 4 Non-Rare Same-Series cards to your deck.  This is NOT optional.

Rebound.DESCRIPTION: Put the next card you play this turn on top of your draw pile.

Recover.DESCRIPTION: Gain [HP] up to the amount you had at the end of your last turn.

Regeneration.DESCRIPTION: Heal HP at the end of the turn. Reduce by 1 each turn.

Rejuvenation.DESCRIPTION: Heal HP at the start of the turn.

Replace.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card and create another card in its place.

Same-Series.DESCRIPTION: A card belonging to the same series as this one.

Semi-Limited.DESCRIPTION: This effect can only trigger once per turn, across all copies of this card.

Slow.DESCRIPTION: For every card you have played this turn, take #b10% more damage from #yAttacks.

Starter.DESCRIPTION: Activates if played at the start of turn.

Startup.DESCRIPTION: Play this effect at the start of combat.

Supercharged.DESCRIPTION: Gains #yCharge as you expend [E]. Consume 8 #yCharge to increase the damage and [Block] of the next card played with damage and [Block] by 25% per stack (this effect can stack).

Synergic.DESCRIPTION: A card that Synergizes with this card.

Temporary HP.DESCRIPTION: Temporary HP lasts until end of combat.

Temporary Thorns.DESCRIPTION: When attacked, deal damage to the attacker. Removed at the end of turn.

Willpower Stance.DESCRIPTION: Stance: [E] is always #yRetained. Other [A-Gen] #yPowers cannot be gained. NL If re-entered: #yBoost [E].

Vigor.DESCRIPTION: The next Attack played deals additional damage per hit.

Wrath Stance.DESCRIPTION: Deal and receive double Attack damage.

DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain Knowledge: Add 1 #yInsight to your discard pile and 1 #yInsight to your hand.
Knowledge.NAME: Knowledge

Prayer.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Prayer: Add 2 #yMiracles with Haste to your draw pile.

DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain Lunacy: Add a number of random cards equal to twice your #yLunacy into your draw pile (max 10).
Lunacy.NAME: Lunacy

DESCRIPTIONS: When you gain #yPestilence: Apply a random #yCommon #yDebuff to ALL enemies. Whenever you apply a #yCommon #yDebuff to an enemy, increase its stacks by an amount equal to twice your #yPestilence.
Pestilence.NAME: Pestilence

DESCRIPTIONS: Start of turn: Increase the Damage and Block of a random card in your hand by a huge percentage of its base damage and block.  Increase that card's cost by 1.
Innovation.NAME: Innovation

DESCRIPTIONS: 1 [EN]: Channel 1 random #yOrb.  Trigger it twice for each additional stack of #yHurricane.  You may activate this twice per turn.
Hurricane.NAME: Hurricane

DESCRIPTIONS: Draw an additional card for each stack at the start of turn.
Bounty.NAME: Bounty

DESCRIPTIONS: Gain an additional energy for each stack at the start of turn.
Overclock.NAME: Overclock

FireLevelPower.DESCRIPTION: Upon reaching an [F] multiple of 15, gain [Strength] (increases your attack damage).

AirLevelPower.DESCRIPTION: Upon reaching an [A] multiple of 15, gain [Dexterity] (increases your block).

MindLevelPower.DESCRIPTION: Upon reaching an [M] multiple of 15, gain [Knowledge] (adds Insights- free card draw cards- into your draw pile and hand).

EarthLevelPower.DESCRIPTION: Upon reaching an [E] multiple of 15, gain [Resistance] (gains Support Damage whenever you are attacked).

LightLevelPower.DESCRIPTION: Upon reaching an [L] multiple of 15, gain [Prayer] (adds Miracles- free energy cards- into your draw pile).

DarkLevelPower.DESCRIPTION: Upon reaching an [L] multiple of 15, gain [Lunacy] (adds random cards into your draw pile).

WaterLevelPower.DESCRIPTION: Upon reaching a [W] multiple of 15, gain [Focus] (increases your orb effectiveness).

PoisonLevelPower.DESCRIPTION: Upon reaching a [P] multiple of 15, gain [Pestilence] (apply Common Debuffs and increases the amounts your Common Debuffs apply).

SteelLevelPower.DESCRIPTION: Upon reaching a [S] multiple of 15, gain [Innovation] (raises a card's damage and block drastically each turn, but raises its cost).

ThunderLevelPower.DESCRIPTION: Upon reaching a [T] multiple of 15, gain [Hurricane] (clickable power that channels and triggers orbs).

NatureLevelPower.DESCRIPTION: Upon reaching a [N] multiple of 15, gain [Bounty] (draw additional cards each turn).

CyberLevelPower.DESCRIPTION: Upon reaching a [C] multiple of 15, gain [Overclock] (gain additional energy each turn).

~Block Scaling.DESCRIPTION: This #yAttack's scaling applies both to its damage and its #yBlock.

~Crystallize.DESCRIPTION: A Status card that gives [Metallicize] at the cost of HP and [E].

~Delayed.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, place this card on the bottom.

~Elemental.DESCRIPTION: Ignores #yThorns. Deal #b30% additional damage if the enemy has #yBlock.

~Ethereal.DESCRIPTION: #yExhausted if in hand at the end of turn.

~Innate.DESCRIPTION: Start each combat with this card in hand. Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, place this card on the top.

~Lock-On.DESCRIPTION: Receive #b50% more damage from Orbs and #b25% from #yRanged attacks.

~Retain.DESCRIPTION: Not discarded at the end of turn. NL If it is an [A-Gen] Power, not reduced at the start of next turn.

~RetainInfinite.DESCRIPTION: Not discarded at the end of turn. NL #yThis #yeffect #yis #ypermanent.

~RetainOnce.DESCRIPTION: Not discarded at the end of turn. NL #bOnce #bactivated, #bremove #bthis #beffect.

~Steal.DESCRIPTION: You can steal up to #b50 #yGold from a boss, #b25 #yGold from an elite, or #b10 #yGold from other non-minion enemies.

~Unique.DESCRIPTION: Can be #yUpgraded any number of times. You can only have 1 copy of this card in your deck, additional copies will #yUpgrade this card instead.
